title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5303.11 - Investigations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5303.11 - Investigations

State Regulations

The commission, or its designee, shall make or cause to
be made an inquiry or investigation concerning an applicant, licensee or
registrant, or any affiliate, intermediary, subsidiary or holding company of an
applicant, licensee or registrant, as the commission may deem appropriate, and
in accordance with article 13 of the Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding

Law, either at the time of the initial application or at any time
thereafter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5303.11

Adopted

New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 9/30/2015

Amended

New

York State Register October 12, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 41, eff. 10/12/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
